messages.message:
Interesting use case request: How difficult will it be for us to support it as part of multi-docs support?

> What I would like to do is have the ability to upload multiple documents and then compare those documents to another document that is a law/standard.
> 
> Ex: upload an img screenshot of cloud environment configurations (aws/gcp) and a policy document then ask that converse to compare those two documents to a subsection of another document to see if it meets the criteria it states.
@Rafal @Hari
